title: Kyokujitsu no Kantai (The Fleet of the Rising Sun)
synopsis: In Kyokujitsu no Kantai, Japan builds up on its success in the earlier series by expanding its blue-water capabilities to reach the Atlantic Ocean, challenging the Kriegsmarine in the process. Nazi Germany also launches a surgical strike on the White House and the Japanese fleet repels a German invasion of Britain.
staff: [['Matano, Hiromichi', ['Director']], ['Matsuura, Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Okamoto, Hideki', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Mechanical Design']], ['Takeda, Yuuichirou', ['Script']]]
